title: UNABLE TO FACE A WELL PREDICTED DEFEAT FOR DMK; KARUNANIDHI SAYS HE IS BOYCOTTING BYE ELECTION
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The Pudukottai by-election is likely to be a cakewalk for the ruling Jayalalitha led AIADMK, as the main Opposition DMK of Karunanidhi has decided to boycott the poll, saying that opposition parties would not get justice from the Election Commission, reported the Hindu….
